Joan Grèbol

Position: PhD student

Email: joan.grebol@dipc.org

Education

  • 2023: MSc in Chemistry, Master's in Advanced Catalysis and Molecular Modelling (MACMoM), Universitat de Girona (UdG), Girona, Catalunya.
  • 2022: BSc in Chemistry, Universitat de Girona (UdG), Girona, Catalunya.

Research Topics

  • Hilbert-space schemes as tools for the description of electronic structure indicators. The PhD thesis is involved in the AccuMolPro project, supervised by Dr. Eduard Matito (DIPC) and Dr. Pedro Salvador (UdG).
